title: 5 bedroom 4 bathroom full house on 1 acre
body:
Beautiful private executive home on nearly one acre with tennis / sports court, situated in Fleetwood area of Surrey. Backing on to green belt and children‚Äôs play park. Massive 3 car garage.
No other suites - full house.
Close to all Amenities, shopping, churches, Temple, 2 Golf Courses and Surrey Lake Park
Easy Access to 64 Ave, Hwy# 10 and 152 Street Bus routes.
2 Master Bedrooms with full ensuites and 2 Additional bedrooms with shared bathroom.  Plus Spacious Laundry room upstairs.
Large Office/Bedroom on main with adjacent full bathroom.
Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen, Family Room, Games / media Room on Main.
For Serious Enquires  Contact with Family Size, Work History, Phone Number.
Not just with ‚Äúis it available?‚Äù
References, background check and proof of Income required
Utilities not included.
Absolutely No Smoking, No Pets, No subletting.

title: 5BR in North Surrey - Bolivar Heights
body:
5 Bedroom House For Rent at Bolivar Heights on a 10,000 sq ft lot
Spacious inside and out, Pet Friendly!
Available October 2025
Full home for rent, upper-level had 3 bedrooms with a washroom. Lower floor has additional 2 bedrooms and washroom. Possible opportunity to sublet the bottom floor.
Located in a quiet, family-friendly neighbourhood in Bolivar Heights with just minutes to Central City, schools & parks, transit, Skytrain & 2 bridges.
Top floor
3 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom
Updated kitchen lots of storage
Large living/dining space with cozy gas fireplace
Bottom floor
2 bedrooms
1 bathroom with jacuzzi
In-suite laundry
Parking for 5 vehicles
Safe, quiet street in Bolivar Heights
Close to parks, schools and bus stops
5 minutes to Central City
20 minutes walk to Gateway SkyTrain Station
Rent: $3,200/month
Tenants are responsible for their own utilities
Pets (one dog or one cat) are allowed with a deposit
Available: October 2025
Reference check required (preferably one current employer and one former landlord)
A background check and proof of employment/income will be required.
If you are interested, please email
.

title: FOR RENT -Acreage Home with 5 Bedrooms
body:
FOR RENT 5 Bedroom Acreage Home at Crescent Road, S. Surrey
Situated in a park-like setting amongst multi-million-dollar properties, this home is sitting on one acre land at Crescent Road in South Surrey.
Surrounded by mature beautiful trees, well designed and renovated, this cozy family home has total 5 Bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.
On the main are:
- a large sized Family Room
- a Living Room with huge picture-windows covered with new zebra blinds
- Kitchen
- Family Nook off the Kitchen
- and a formal Dining Area
- 3 bedrooms
- 2 full bathrooms
Downstairs has:
- 2 Bedrooms
- Den and storage
- huge rec room complete with washer and dryer
(No kitchen in basement)
RENT: $3,200 per month.
Utilities Extra.  (Tenant pays for all utilities)
To arrange for a showing, provide present employment details of each adult who‚Äôd be living at the property and the reason for moving from present residence.
No Showing Request Shall Be Responded Without Above info.
Reference checks from previous landlord, employer(s) etc. and credit checks for selected applicants will be required.
(Landlord reserves the right to accept/reject any application without being obligated to provide any reason)

title: Spacious 2 Bedrooms with 1 Bathroom Home
body:
Availability: July 16, 2025
Rent: $2,190 per month
2 bedroom home boasts a large open concept kitchen, living room and dining room, while also offering a spacious private deck and landscaped front yard for outdoor living. This home is in a convenient central location on a quite street. With two bedrooms and one full bathroom it is a great family home. Some features include, hardwood floors, wood burning fireplaces, large sundeck & double glazed vinyl windows. This is a huge, flat, 9096 sq. ft. lot.
Building: a house
Unit type: Main unit on the 2nd floor
Floor area: 1,020 sq ft
Bathroom: 2
Flooring: hardwood floors
Kitchen and Laundry: Yes (shared with the ground floor unit)
Parking: Yes
Lease: one year minimum
Deposits: half a month rent as security deposit
Pets: sorry no
Inquiries and viewing appointments are welcome to email back or call

title: House for Rent - 4bd 2bathroom
body:
Beautiful, spacious upper floor of a house for rent: 3 bedrooms upstairs + 1 rec/bed room on the main floor, 2 full bathrooms
Looking for long-term responsible tenants; working professionals or a small family (max. of 4 adult tenants).
- Air conditioning
- Heat pump (hybrid heating)
- Efficient tankless water heater
- Gas stove
- Very close to Gibson elementary and Delview secondary schools
No pets, No smoking
Availability: August 1st
Tenants will be responsible for utilities, and heating/cooling. (60% upstairs, 40% downstairs)
References required.
Viewing can be arranged on Saturdays 2-4pm or Sundays 11am-1pm.

title: 2 BEDS 1 FULL BATH APARTMENT
body:
Fully renovated 2 Bed 1full Bath Home for rent 11463 128St, Surrey-BC.
2 spacious Bedrooms-Bright and comfortable. 1 full Bathroom-modern and sleek design.
Fully Renovated-Brand new finishes and updates throughout. Convenient Location in the Heart of Scott Road Station area.
Minimum 1 year Lease required, 20% Hydro Shared, include Laundry and WIFI
What's Nearby?
